title: Train Heroes
synopsis: 2100A.D. The world has entered a new age of super high-speed railways. The World Railway Conference has introduced the Laser Rail, a whole new form of travel in which trains are no longer confined to the ground.
voices: ['Tanaka, Hideki', 'Okitsu, Kazuyuki', 'Namikawa, Daisuke', 'Ono, Daisuke', 'Urayama, Jin', 'Togashi, Misuzu', 'Ochiai, Kouji']
